questions.prompt: Who is accountable for keeping the canvas accurate and how often is it reviewed?
questions.placeholder: Architecture guild reviews weekly, platform team signs off pre-release, automated checks in CI/CD…

questions.prompt: What signals (detector runs, ADRs, code reviews) should trigger a canvas refresh?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Detector runs nightly, major feature merges require manual annotation, ADR approval auto-updates nodes.

questions.prompt: Map modules to owning teams and outline escalation paths when dependencies degrade.
questions.placeholder: List module → squad, secondary contacts, escalation SLAs, and change approval requirements.

questions.prompt: What health metrics (coverage, TODO thresholds, coupling limits) should we enforce per module?
questions.placeholder: Define minimum coverage, max TODO debt, dependency caps, and alerting thresholds.
